Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1969...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/1970, off Bill Clark (LYN)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pontiac on 6/14/1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1972, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1973...
Injured on 5/14/1974 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 7/8/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1976, hitting .609 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/27/1978 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Penn on 5/24/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1979, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1979, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1980, hitting .387 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
